title: VA - Loving On The Flip Side - Sweet Funk And Beat-Heavy Ballads
description:
Ã¢Ë†â€™ Original Release / Now-Again / WEB  mp3/320

Loving On The Flip Side collects the overlooked ballads from the flip sides of the funk 45s in the Now-Again and Truth and Soul vaults and is presented in the same format that we developed for our Soul Cal anthology. The music contained on Loving On The Flip Side is too damn good to be anonymously relaunched, decades after musical visionaries blended the best of heavy funk and sweet soul into a unified whole. Thus, Loving On The Flip Side again offers the enthused a chance to listen to, read about and reflect on another great burst of black American creativity: the creation of the sublime genre we like to call Ã¢â‚¬Å“sweet funk.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½
